test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.notes: Strategy covers content validation (unit-level), manifest validation (integration-level), and orchestrator flow (integration-level). Security is N/A (no runtime code). Performance validated via NFR-01 test.

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.notes: 33 test cases covering all 29 ACs from 7 FRs + 3 NFRs + 1 constraint = 100% coverage

traceability_matrix_complete.notes: 33 rows in traceability-matrix.csv mapping all ACs to test cases

coverage_targets_defined.notes: 100% AC coverage target; 100% file deliverable validation

test_data_strategy_documented.notes: Test data plan defines keyword sets, expected manifest entries, and file paths

critical_paths_identified.notes: P0 critical paths: agent existence, skill manifest entries, orchestrator Step 3.5, fail-open handling

article_ii_test_first.notes: All 33 tests designed before implementation (Phase 05 before Phase 06). Test file runs RED (32 fail, 1 pass) confirming test-first.

article_vii_traceability.notes: 100% requirement coverage: all 29 ACs mapped to test cases in traceability-matrix.csv. No orphan tests (all trace to an AC or NFR).

article_ix_quality_gate.notes: All GATE-05 checklist items verified. All required artifacts created: test-strategy.md, test-cases.md, traceability-matrix.csv, test-data-plan.md, executable test file.

article_xi_integration_testing.notes: Integration points validated: orchestrator Step 3.5 insertion, skill manifest entries, consolidation skill update. Mutation testing targets documented.
